MoonImageSaved: A imagem foi salva no diário!
TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Moon activity. Moon activity is Moon phase viewer, includes Lunar phase information and eclipse data
TutoActivityButtonContent: Click here to update the title of the activity to easily find it in the Journal
TutoToggleGridButtonContent: Click here to display a grid with the latitude and Longitude (in degrees) of each area of the Moon
TutoToggleHemisphereButtonContent: Click here to rotate the Moon to 180 degrees to it's back
TutoSaveImageButtonContent: Click here to save the current moon image to your journal, where you can use it for other activites
TutoFullScreenButtonContent: Click here to toggle between full and non-full screen
TutoStopButtonContent: Click on this icon to stop the activity and go back to the home.
TutoPanelLeftContent: Find here live information on the Moon and its current whereabouts
